_header: He that made us on mould
_description: The Avowynge of King Arther — seventy-two 16-line stanzas (aaabcccbdddbeeeb)

PULTayM9.First Lines:
HE þat Made vs on þe mulde& fare fourmet þe
                    folde…
PULTayM9.Last Lines:
…And gife vs all gode Endingethat made vs on þe
                    mulde

Robson,  John. 
             “Three Early English Metrical Romances.”

         o.s. 18 (1842): 57-93.
French,  Walter Hoyt,  and  Charles Brockway Hale.

         New York: Prentice-Hall, 1930: 607.
Hahn,  Thomas,
                        ed.

         Kalamazoo, MI: Western Michigan University for TEAMS, 1995: 113-68.
